name: Ironic
description: A Virtual DOM Library to build UI Interfaces.
features: Break the UI into a Component Hierarchy.
Uses diffing algorithm similar to React.js for minimum possible update to the DOM Tree.
Single Event Manager for an Entire App.

name: GodPromise
description: Implementation of Promise in JS based on Promises/A+ Spec.

name: Blitz
features: Small, fast, and modular DOM & Event library for modern browsers.
Same familiar API as jQuery (but without the extra weight of modules like $.ajax, $.animate etc.).
The source is written in ES6.

name: Rooter
features: Compatible with History and Hash routing.
